string.value: For helping Maria, #bLucas#k offers to introduce you to a person who can train you. Hmm, who could he mean?

Lucas tells you to head to #bthe East Field of Amherst#k and find #bMai#k, who trains there. He thinks you'd benefit from her tutelage. #k

You completed all of Mai's Trainings and returned to Lucas.
I knew you'd be back. Ready for training?
Then head east. You'll find #bMai#k at the #bEast Field of Amherst#k. She is more than qualified to train you. Once you're done with all her lessons, return to Amherst. I'll be waiting for you.
If you aren't ready yet, then I'll wait. Let me know when you're ready.
Ohhh, you've completed all of Mai's Training! You look much stronger than when I first met you. A bit more training, and you'll be ready to head over to Victoria Island. Do you need directions?

There's actually only one way to get to Victoria Island from here. Take the #bsoutheast route at the split road#k to get to #bSouthperry#k where you'll find #bShanks#k running a ship that heads to Victoria Island. He usually charges 150 mesos per ride, but he'll let a great traveler like you go for free.
Here's a #brecommendation letter#k I wrote for you. Take it to Shanks and he'll definitely let you get on the ride for free. I hope your journey is filled with greatness!
I don't think you have completed all of Mai's Training yet. I understand that Mai's Trainings are tough, but I suggest you gut it out. She knows what she's doing.
